Devi Lal Northern Regional Centre situated at GT Road, (near Bahalgarh) in District Sonepat is spread over 83 acres of the land came into existence in the year 2005.This is a prestigious centre in the state of Haryana for producing National and International level sportspersons. Further, since 2009 this Centre has been identified by SAI as Wrestling Hub for training of wrestling probables for preparation of Indian Teams for participation in various prestigious international competitions.This centre has produced Olympic Medalists like Shri Sushil Kumar and Shri Yogeshwar Dutt in Wrestling and Vijender Singh in Boxing.Apart this, there are innumerable wrestlers who have achieved excellence at the international level. The Centre is now responsible for implementing and monitoring SAI Sports Promotional Schemes in the States of Haryana and Delhi.
